headline.main: MOUNTING DRIVE ON SMOKING STIRS TENSIONS IN WORKPLACE

byline.original: By ANDREW H. MALCOLM, Special to the New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The mounting drive to limit public smoking is complicating many personal relationships and creating some serious tensions in the nation's workplace.
docs.snippet: LEAD: The mounting drive to limit public smoking is complicating many personal relationships and creating some serious tensions in the nation's workplace.

headline.main: ANSWERS ABOUT NEW YORK'S NEW RULES FOR SMOKING

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Beginning on May 7, smoking will be banned in most public indoor areas in New York State and restricted on the job and in most restaurants.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Beginning on May 7, smoking will be banned in most public indoor areas in New York State and restricted on the job and in most restaurants.
